metadata.name: Scion of Life Initiation
metadata.description:
Inspired by the definitive but abstract form "Sendrock Glyph : Origin" encoded with layers of geometric and archetypal meaning, "Scion of Life Initiation" allows the mind of its owner to deeply connect with the woven energies of wisdom traditions from this world and beyond. It contains time, faith, logic, love, gain and death.

The myriad effects of the Sendrock Glyph became known as the Scion of Life Initiation, an ever unfolding and empowered calling to serve life and walk along ouá¹› highest destiny path.
This combination was chosen to induce a sense of calm stillness amidst the intensity of connection that occurs when the central point is held in focus.

1080x1080 loop
60fps
10 seconds

Made with Blender, Photoshop & After Effects
